import React from 'react' import Cards from './Cards'; import Tag from './Tag'; import Star from './Star'; import {PlusIcon} from '@heroicons/react/outline'; import Button from './Button'; const Trending = () => { let comicsInfo =[ {id:"1",title:"Civil War II",starRating: "2.34" ,house:"Marvel",year: "2016",genre: "CrossOver",price:"$100",cast:"Iron Man | Captain Marvel",image:"https://readcomicsonline.ru/uploads/manga/civil-war-ii-2016/chapters/1/01.jpg"}, {id:"2",title:"NEW RELEASES",starRating: "2.34" ,house:"Marvel",year: "2016",genre: "CrossOver",price:"$53",cast:"Iron Man | Captain Marvel",image:"https://readcomicsonline.ru/uploads/manga/civil-war-ii-2016/chapters/1/01.jpg"}, {id:"3",title:"NEW RELEASES",starRating: "2.34" ,house:"Marvel",year: "2016",genre: "CrossOver",price:"$144",cast:"Iron Man | Captain Marvel",image:"https://readcomicsonline.ru/uploads/manga/civil-war-ii-2016/chapters/1/01.jpg"}, {id:"4",title:"NEW RELEASES",starRating: "2.34" ,house:"Marvel",year: "2016",genre: "CrossOver",price:"$113",cast:"Iron Man | Captain Marvel",image:"https://readcomicsonline.ru/uploads/manga/civil-war-ii-2016/chapters/1/01.jpg"}, ]; return (

Trending

{comicsInfo.map((comic)=>(
{comic.title} NEW!

This is a wider card with supporting text below as a natural lead-in to additional content. This content is a little bit longer.

{comic.price}

))}
) } export default Trending
